name: Ladybug Simulator 3D
description:
Role play a LADYBUG :)

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the forest!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A LADYBUG PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of ladybug to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE LADYBUG - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A LADYBUG PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a ladybug! Zoom in and out to accomplish your ladybug missions! Hunt prey to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
LADYBUG PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE LADYBUG!

Like us on Doodle Club!

Follow us on Chroma Club!

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
